content: create your own adorable penguin squish with this intermediate-level crochet pattern the penguin squish is a cool but cuddly and very squishy the finished penguin measures approximately 10 across/tall excluding flippers and feet this pattern includes detailed instructions for crocheting in the round and seaming **unique features-** intermediate level pattern for a challenging yet rewarding project detailed instructions for crocheting in the round and seaming adorable penguin design perfect for animal lovers **materials needed-** us-l 8 0 mm hook **susan bates** https //amzn to/3spls2d 235 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/4mba3fo 6 - super bulky **10 microbead pillow ball** https //amzn to/3zqefkm or fiber fill **2 safety eyes - 24mm** https //amzn to/3qjgplf **stitch markers** https //www yarnspirations com/susan-bates-crystalites-stitchpins/14129m html &utm_source=influencer_moogly&utm_medium=blog&utm_campaign=2023_7_penguinsquish
